name: Unidentified_Sullustan_cryptologist
content:
A Sullustan female cryptologist assisted in the training of clone commandos some time before the outbreak of the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems in 22 BBY. The clone commando RC-1136 remembered her teaching a memorably unpleasant lesson on encryption techniques while he was training on the Wild Space planet Kamino before the outbreak of the war.
The Sullustan cryptologist was mentioned in the 2004 novel Hard Contact, the first novel in the Republic Commando series written by Karen Traviss.
